# SROI Walkthrough

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

df <- read.csv("sample data/sroi_sample.csv")

df <- df %>%
  mutate(sroi_ratio = outcome_value / cost)

ggplot(df, aes(x = intervention, y = sroi_ratio)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  labs(title = "SROI by Intervention")
```
